meanings.definition: Tissue or organ transplanted from one individual to another of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The doctors performed homografts to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent2: Homografts are important in medical procedures to help patients in need.
meanings.sent3: The homografts were like a gift of life from one person to another.
meanings.sent4: The homografts acted as bridges connecting the two individuals.
meanings.sent5: The concept of homografts showcases the beauty of human generosity.

meanings.definition: To transplant tissue or organs from one individual to another of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The surgeons will homografts the healthy tissue into the patient's body.
meanings.sent2: It is common for doctors to homografts organs to save lives.
meanings.sent3: The doctors decided to homografts the organ with great care and precision.
meanings.sent4: She had to homografts the tissue quickly to prevent further damage.
meanings.sent5: The ability to homografts successfully requires skill and expertise.
